name: Santa's Hitman
description:
You have been very naughty. To redeem your sins you have to become Santa's Hitman!

It's a simple game where you have to find and throw snowball at described target. 

  • WASD - Movement
  • SHIFT - Run (You have limited energy)
  • C - Sneak (Enemies have lower range of view, you gain energy faster when sneaking)
  • LEFT MOUSE BUTTON - Throw
  • HOLD RIGHT MOUSE BUTTON - Gather snowballs
